title: Ronald Smith (boxer)
text:
Ronald Anthony Smith (14 October 1944 – 19 October 2011) was a British <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He fought as Ronnie Smith and competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201964%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Featherweight">featherweight event</a> at the <a href="1964%20Summer%20Olympics">1964 Summer Olympics</a>.
Smith won the 1964 <a href="England%20Boxing">Amateur Boxing Association</a> British <a href="England%20Boxing%20National%20Amateur%20Championships%20Featherweight%20Champions">featherweight title</a>, when boxing out of the Fisher ABC.
